assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Tilaknagar Industries Ltd. manufactures and sells Indian made foreign liquor and its related products in India. The company's products include whisky, brandy, rum, vodka, and gin. It offers brandy under the Mansion House and Courier Napoleon brands; whisky under the Mansion House, Senate Royal, and Senate Royale Red brands; rum under the Madiraa brand; and gin under the Blue Lagoon brand. The company also exports its products in East and South-East Asia, Africa, the Middle East, and Europe. Tilaknagar Industries Ltd. was founded in 1933 and is based in Mumbai, India.
